Subject: [EXTERNAL] Re: U.S. v. Maxwell, Case No. 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) [Maxwell's Resp to Ltr. Moms to Quash EVCP 
Sub ] 
Date: Mon, 22 Nov 2021 23:27:41 +0000 
Good evening-
We have conferred with the government and they have agreed to serve the moving parties after applying appropriate redactions. 
They have informed us that the EVCP has been served. We will inform the Court when the government has served the remaining parties. 
Best-
Bobbi 
Please note my new office address and preferred email address: 
BOBBI C. STERNHEIM, ESQ. 
Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim 
225 Broadway, Suite 715 
New York, NY 10007 
Main:

Fax: 
This message and any attached documents contain information from the Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim that may be 
confidential and/or privileged. 
If you are not the intended recipient, you may not read, copy, distribute, or use this information. 
If you have received this transmission in error, please notify the sender immediately by reply e-mail and then delete this 
message. Thank you.

wrote: 
Good afternoon: 
We have contacted the government and are awaiting a response to work through any redaction issues. 
We will notify the Court as soon as service has been completed. 
Best-
Bobbi

Sincerely,

Subject: U.S. v. Maxwell, Case No. 20 Cr. 330 (MN) [Maxwell's Resp to Ltr. Motns to Quash EVCP Sub ) 
CAUTION - EXTERNAL: 
Dear Judge Nathan: 
; bcsternheim mac.com 
<bcstemheim@m 
At the request of Jeffrey Pagliuca, please see attached Ms. Maxwell's Response to the Letter Motions to Quash her Rule 17(c) 
subpoena to the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program. 
Pursuant to our established protocol, we are submitting the Response to the Court under temporary seal to allow the government to 
propose any redactions it deems necessary. 
Regards, 
Nicole 
Nicole Simmons 
Haddon, Morgan and 
Foreman, P.C.

Denver, Colorado
